short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: HuntStar official extension. Assistance in recruiting and scoring vacancies.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Innovative solutions for your HR department
Accelerate and simplify the hiring process with advanced technology.
* AI search engine for cold search of candidates. A system for searching and evaluating resumes on job aggregators.
* AI-scoring of resumes. Automatic evaluation of responses based on any criteria.
* Job interview appointment bot. Automate the recording of candidates for meetings with a Telegram bot.
* Outsourcing technical interviews. Trust our experts to test candidates' technical skills.
